mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (email, name, zip_code, address, order_time, order_status) VALUES (#{email}, #{name}, #{zipCode}, #{address}, #{orderTime}, #{orderStatus})
INSERT INTO order_item (order_id, item_id, order_cnt, price) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{itemId}, #{orderCnt}, #{price})
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET total_price = #{totalPrice} WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT oi.*, i.item_name FROM order_item oi JOIN item i ON oi.item_id = i.item_id WHERE oi.order_id = #{orderId}
